ds2.1.7:6.2: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti;
ds2.1.7:6.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:7.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:8.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tajjācakkhuviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:9.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye tajjācakkhuviññāṇadhātusamphassajā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:10.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye tajjācakkhuviññāṇadhātusamphassajā cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:11.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjācakkhuviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.7:12.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:14.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjācakkhuviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.7:15.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:16.2: Yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ—
ds2.1.7:16.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:17.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, tīṇindriyāni honti, eko phasso hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:17.3: ekā cakkhuviññāṇadhātu hoti, ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.7:17.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:18.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—
ds2.1.7:18.4: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārakkhandho hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:19.2: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ saddārammaṇaṃ … pe …
ds2.1.7:19.4: ghānaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ … pe …
ds2.1.7:19.6: jivhāviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rasārammaṇaṃ … pe …
ds2.1.7:19.8: kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti sukhasahagataṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, sukhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti;
ds2.1.7:19.9: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:20.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:21.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tajjākāyaviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṃ kāyikaṃ sātaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyasamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ kāyasamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:22.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye tajjākāyaviññāṇadhātusamphassajā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:23.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye tajjākāyaviññāṇadhātusamphassajā cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:24.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjākāyaviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.7:25.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye kāyikaṃ sātaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyasamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ kāyasamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:27.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjākāyaviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.7:28.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye kāyikaṃ sātaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyasamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ kāyasamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:29.2: Yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ—
ds2.1.7:29.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:30.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, tīṇindriyāni honti, eko phasso hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:30.3: ekā kāyaviññāṇadhātu hoti, ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.7:30.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:31.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—
ds2.1.7:31.4: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārakkhandho hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:34.2: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manodhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā … pe … phoṭṭhabbārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti;
ds2.1.7:34.5: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:35.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:36.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanodhātusamphassajaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:37.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanodhātusamphassajā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:38.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanodhātusamphassajā cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:39.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanodhātu—
ds2.1.7:40.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā—
ds2.1.7:41.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāro cittassa anusandhānatā anupekkhanatā—
ds2.1.7:42.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:44.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanodhātu—
ds2.1.7:45.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:46.2: Yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ—
ds2.1.7:46.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:47.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, tīṇindriyāni honti, eko phasso hoti … pe … ekā manodhātu hoti, ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.7:47.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:48.2: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro cittassekaggatā jīvitindriyaṃ;
ds2.1.7:48.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—
ds2.1.7:48.4: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārakkhandho hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:51.2: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti somanassasahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā … pe …
ds2.1.7:51.4: dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti;
ds2.1.7:51.5: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:52.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:53.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:54.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:55.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ—
ds2.1.7:56.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.7:57.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā—
ds2.1.7:58.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāro cittassa anusandhānatā anupekkhanatā—
ds2.1.7:59.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye pīti pāmojjaṃ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṃ attamanatā cittassa—
ds2.1.7:60.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:62.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.7:63.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:64.2: Yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ—
ds2.1.7:64.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:65.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, tīṇindriyāni honti, eko phasso hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:65.3: ekā manoviññāṇadhātu hoti, ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.7:65.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:66.2: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā jīvitindriyaṃ;
ds2.1.7:66.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—
ds2.1.7:66.4: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārakkhandho hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:69.2: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā … pe …
ds2.1.7:69.4: dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti;
ds2.1.7:69.5: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.7:72.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ—

ds2.1.7:74.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—

ds2.1.7:76.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāro cittassa anusandhānatā anupekkhanatā—
ds2.1.7:77.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.7:79.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.7:80.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—

ds2.1.7:81.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:82.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, tīṇindriyāni honti, eko phasso hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:82.3: ekā manoviññāṇadhātu hoti, ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.7:82.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.7:83.2: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro cittassekaggatā jīvitindriyaṃ;
ds2.1.7:83.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—
ds2.1.7:83.4: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārakkhandho hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:86.2: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā … pe …
ds2.1.7:86.16: upekkhāsahagatā ñāṇavippayuttā sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇā vā … pe …
ds2.1.7:86.18: dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:89.2: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:89.9: Tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:90.2: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā … pe … dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ … pe …
ds2.1.7:90.12: pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:90.17: Tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sukhassa ca pahānā … pe … pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:93.2: Yasmiṃ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā … pe … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:93.9: Tasseva arūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā … pe … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:94.2: Yasmiṃ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā … pe … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:94.9: Tasseva arūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā … pe … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:95.2: Yasmiṃ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā … pe … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:95.9: Tasseva arūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā … pe … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:96.2: Yasmiṃ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā … pe … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.7:96.9: Tasseva arūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā … pe … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
